name: VM Tycoons Businesses
description: 10,000 Tycoons are headed to the metaverse after news of untapped business opportunities! Our 10,000 algorithmically randomized NFTs are built on its very own Tri-Token architecture. This structure creates an endless opportunity of gamification and value to its holders, indefinitely, in a perpetual loop. Not only are Tycoons highly desirable, collectible NFTs, they also generate $BUSINESS. In short, when you start your business at vmtycoon.io they start working. The rate at which they generate $BUSINESS depends on their merchant power, measured by level. Over time, Tycoon owners can increase their merchant power with $DOLLA. This not only increases the cash flow of your Tycoon, but their desirability too, as it permanently upgrades their on-chain metadata. To put it simply - VM Tycoon NFTs are the only way to create new $BUSINESS - the corporate structure for the VM Tycoon ecosystem
